about.description: I'm pursuing a Full-Stack Web Development Certificate from Georgia Tech and have extensive management experience as an environmental geologist and marketer. I have a passion for creating clean, polished UI designs using HTML, CSS, & JavaScript, keeping user functionality in mind.
